root.name: Pumuckls Abenteuer im Geisterschloss
root.description: OverviewPumuckls Abenteuer im Geisterschloss is an action game developed by NEON Software and published by Acclaim Entertainment for the Game Boy Color platform.Pumuckls Abenteuer im Geisterschloss was only released in Germany and is based off of a cartoon series titled Pumuckls Abenteuer. both the game and TV show star the main character Pumuckl.
